## stacksInHand() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get a list of tiles that a player has in their hand, grouped by bug type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function stacksInHand(board: GameBoard, color: Color, config: GameConfig): TileId[][];
```

**Returns:**

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md)<!-- -->\[\]\[\]

A list of tile ids in the given players hand, grouped by bug type.
